questions.text: Who did the US Women's national soccer team beat when they won the 1999 Women's World Cup?
questions.explanation:
China.

	It was 0-0 after extra time. The USA won 5-4 on penalties.

questions.text: Where did Michael Jordan go to college?
questions.explanation:
North Carolina.

	He went to the University of North Carolina, home of the Tarheels!

questions.text: Which basketball team was Shaquille O'Neal playing for in 2000?
Who of the following never played pro baseball?
questions.explanation:
Cobi Jones.

	Cobi Jones played pro soccer for the LA Galaxy.
